alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 17 at 3:40AM MDT until June 17 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR DRY THUNDERSTORMS...WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 489 BELOW 7000 FEET... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 489 San Rafael Swell. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 14 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated to widely scattered dry thunderstorms are possible this afternoon and evening. Strong and erratic outflow winds are possible. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of lightning...dry fuel conditions...and gusty winds will create favorable conditions for new fire starts and extreme fire behavior.
